job_title: Tutor in Boca Raton, FL

IT makes changes to computers without informing staff. SAT scores made optional. Overall, more good points than bad.

review_title: every bit a business that just happens to be an academic institution
job_title: Program Coordinator in Boca Raton, FL
pros: As my boss (a Vice President) was fond of saying: "You couldn't get experience like this anywhere else - if you can navigate the politics at Lynn, you can excel anywhere!" On the truly 'plus' side: fellow 'minion' employees were lovely people, the campus is beautiful and the university is small enough to become knowable in a short time.
cons: Employees are either members of The Family or serving to grease the wheels for someone else who is.

review_title: I've had a wonderful time building a sense of community in my work environment at Lynn
